assuming you can resize partitions to make room for swap
i have no data i care about on the machine and 2 500 gb dirves
you can use gparted to make the partition (system > admin > partition editor, install gparted if it's not there)
then you just add a line like this to your fstab: UUID=xxxxxxxxx none    swap    sw      0       0
use blkid command to get the UUIDs
then you can use swapon -a to activate it without rebooting
